title: Strengthening Teaching Method Practical Competencies: Short-Term Intensive Course for Improving Practical Tennis Serve and Return Techniques

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic tennis techniques (forehand, backhand) and racket control proficiency
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Execute various serve types (flat, spin, slice) reflecting actual match situations with 70% accuracy.
Identify and execute at least three return strategies based on the opponent’s serve patterns.
Achieve success in changing serve directions, including targeting the outer court, in at least three out of five attempts during training.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
